data.name: Bosslords
data.detailed_description:
Choose between several main characters, each with their own unique storylines and abilities


Explore the maps while avoiding the enemy


Recruit minions for you army and support them in battle with spells and abilities


Discover a vast variety of items, spells, minions and unlockables

Bosslords - a new type of roguelite!

Bosslords is a new type of roguelite where have to gather an army of rather cheerful monsters and beasts to fight alongside you in tactical real-time battles. You play as one of several Bosslords, each with their unique abilities and storylines, and move around on maps in a variety of regions.

Similar to games like FTL, you are also being chased by an enemy on the map and if you get caught you'd better be ready for a tough battle! On the map, there are points of interest that lead to various story events, battles and, of course, loot!

You can find a huge variety of equipment for both your minions and your bosslord. You can also equip your Bosslord with various spells to use during combat. But your main offense is still your horde of minions. Place the minions in formations that make the best use of their unique strengths and have them charge into battle.
If you lose a battle or make a bad decision, the group morale drops. Once it's down to 0, it's game over. But do not fret! By defeating bosses in the game you earn special coins, that can be used to gain additional starting formations and upgrades for your Bosslords and even unlock new characters!

Key features:

  • A Roguelite with real-time tactical battles
  • Over 30 different types of minions to recruit
  • Choose between several unique main characters
  • A ton of equipment, spells and unlockables to discover
  • Explore a wide variety of regions while avoiding traps and enemies
  • More than 100 story events with choices and consequences
  • Charmingly animated 2d graphics
  • 80+ tracks of original music

data.short_description: Bosslords is a roguelite where you gather an army of monsters that fight alongside you in large real-time battles. Explore a diverse fantasy world with story events, find new spells and equipment and access more upgrades and unlocks between runs. Now, show them who's the Bosslord!
